items.name: case satisfied
items.desc: The path is ready to be used for network connections.

items.name: case unsatisfied
items.desc: The path for network connections is not available, either due to lack of network connectivity or being prohibited by system policy.

items.name: case satisfiable
items.desc: The path is not currently satisfied, but may become satisfied upon a connection attempt. This can be due to a service, such as a VPN or a cellular data connection not being activated.
